name: Playbook
description: A versioned declarative file defining rules, tasks, and actions for execution.

name: Workflow
description: The runtime execution of a Playbook, composed of steps and transitions.

name: Step
description: A logical control block in a Workflow that defines sequencing and conditions.

name: Task
description: An container unit of action group.

name: Action
description: An atomic executable unit, often interfacing with APIs or databases.

name: Target
description: A runtime scope or destination for workflow execution (e.g., environment, system).

name: Endpoint
description: An external API or internal service URL invoked by Actions or Tasks.

name: Model
description: An AI/ML model used within workflows.

name: Dataset
description: A structured collection of data used for training, testing, or inference.

name: Connector
description: An integration interface to external systems (e.g., database, API, queue).

name: Trigger
description: An event or condition that initiates a Playbook or Workflow execution.
